participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, Alex is passionate about pursuing her music career despite the challenges she faces. She often expresses her emotions through her art and seeks to inspire others with her songs.
participant_1.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and nurturing, Jamie finds joy in helping others and is dedicated to making a positive impact in her community. She balances her work with meaningful volunteer efforts, showcasing her selflessness.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
